revised_title: Lindemann's Contributions to World War I and His Impact on Defense Science
tldr: The article discusses F. A. Lindemann's significant contributions to defense science during World War I. Lindemann worked on various projects, including detecting aircraft using infrared technology, designing rate-of-climb meters, and analyzing the aerodynamics of spinning aircraft. His work led him to the heart of government during World War II, where he developed a close friendship with Winston Churchill and had a conflict with Henry Tizard.
